text: John Nelson Brandenburg (April 29, 1929 â€“ January 14, 2020) was an American lieutenant general in the U.S. Army. He was born in Enid, Oklahoma. He was a commander of the I Corps at Fort Lewis, a post which he served from 1981 to 1984. He was also a commander of the 101st Airborne Division from 1978 to 1980. He retired from the military in May 1984 after 33 years of service. On January 14, 2020, Brandenburg died at his home in Canton, Georgia. He was 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American generals Category:American military personnel of the Vietnam War Category:People from Enid, Oklahoma Category:Military people from Oklahoma
title: John N. Brandenburg
